Corvas.name: Corvas
Corvas.notes: Bad range, fire rate, magazine size. Decent crit and damage.

Cyngas.name: Cyngas
Cyngas.notes: Great status chance, reload time, accuracy, and damage. Low ammo capacity. Burst fires.

Dual Decurion.name: Dual Decurion
Dual Decurion.notes: Falls off by level 40. Inaccurate, awful recoil, low magazine size and damage. Fast reload time and hitscan.

Fluctus.name: Fluctus
Fluctus.notes: Great accuracy, fire rate, reload time, mag size. Shoots waves.

Grattler.name: Grattler
Grattler.notes: High damage, fire rate and reload time. Magazine is small for fire rate. Self damages. Innate punchthrough.

Phaedra.name: Phaedra
Phaedra.notes: Hitscan, good status chance. Low accuracy, and reload time. Worse damage than other weapons, spins up.

Vandal Imperator.name: Vandal Imperator
Vandal Imperator.notes: Hitscan, Gigantic Magazine, Reload Time is more than Fire rate. Low damage per bullet. Spools-up

Velocitus.name: Velocitus
Velocitus.notes: Great damage, ammo, accuracy, and travel time. Mod changes if it should be charged or spammed.

Agkuza.name: Agkuza
Agkuza.notes: Really poor crit stats, but very high base damage, speed and stance to make it worthy

Centaur.name: Centaur
Centaur.notes: Great stats in attack speed, base damage, critical stats and has a good innate stance

Kaszas.name: Kaszas
Kaszas.notes: Poor critical stats, high base damage, good speed and stance

Knux.name: Knux
Knux.notes: A status monster. Base damage is high, speed is good, stance is clunky

Onorix.name: Onorix
Onorix.notes: A critical weapon with a sad 1.3x multiplier. Second worst archmelee by far. Still an upgrade to the Veritux

Prisma Veritux.name: Prisma Veritux
Prisma Veritux.notes: A Centaur with much less crit and slightly higher base damage. Still good, stance is smooth

Rathbone.name: Rathbone
Rathbone.notes: Stance is amazing, poor stats otherwise. High damage with melee combo

Amesha.name: Amesha
Amesha.notes: Watchful Swarm blocks a number of attacks on target ally. Benevolent Decoy creates a sphere that attracts all projectiles, healing friendlies for a percent of total damage abosrbed, per second. Warding Grace is an aura that slows enemies and prevents status effect on allies in range. Vengeful Rush converts all damage taken to energy, while boosting ability range, duration, and strength by 10% for allies in range, until energy is full.
Amesha.use: Charge Based Shield; Healing & Projectile Block; Status-Immunity & Slow; Ability Buff Aura

Elytron.name: Elytron
Elytron.notes: Bloomer sends a missile out to seek enemies, recast to detonate. Core Vent leaves smoke behind the Elytron, destroying projectiles that touch it. Can be augmented to do DOT. Thumper fires a beacon in a straight line; if recast or on collision, it pulses explosions for 30-45 sec. Warhead launches an aimable missle which deals massive damage and knockback.
Elytron.use: Nuke; Projectile Block; AOE DOT; AOE Nuke + Knockback

Itzal.name: Itzal
Itzal.notes: Blink teleports the Itzal forward a long distance, or until blocked, stunning all enemies in an area upon arrival. Penumbra is an aura that Cloaks allies in an area unless they move. Cosmic Crush pulls enemies in range to the Itzal then deals a burst of damage (if augmented it Freezes targets hit). Fighter Escort summons drones that zap enemies and explode after 15-30 sec or on death.
Itzal.use: AOE Stun, Teleportation, AOE Cloaking, Vacuum, Drones

Odonata Prime.name: Odonata Prime
Odonata Prime.notes: Energy Shell creates a mobile shield in front of Odonata (if augmented, nearby allies) that blocks all ranged attacks, applies 50% of weapon base damage as Heat and increases crit damage by 200%. Disarray fires flares that stagger enemies and destroy projectiles; Seeking Fire launches rockets at enemies, dealing damage. Repel knocks back, stuns for a duration, and disarms forever, any enemy in it's range when cast
Odonata Prime.use: Crit+Damage Boost & Shield; Projectile Block; AOE Blast; AOE Stun & Disarm

Adarza Kavat.name: Adarza Kavat
Adarza Kavat.notes: Cat's Eye grants 60% Flat Critical Chance to all Friendly Targets for 10 sec every 20 sec. Reflect gives a 40% Chance to reflect damage taken, dealing 160% of it back to the target.

Carrier Prime.name: Carrier Prime
Carrier Prime.notes: Ammo Case grants a 25% increase to your ammo pool and converts any unused ammo drops into usable ammo for your equipped weapon every 2 sec. Looter will break nearby containers. Goes down a tier if using non-bullet hose.

Chesa Kubrow.name: Chesa Kubrow
Chesa Kubrow.notes: Neutralize disarm an enemy within 20 m every few sec. Retrieve causes the Chesa to seek out dropped Mods, Energy Orbs, Health Orbs, Scannable Plants, Ayatan Sculptures, Ammo and Resource drops within 18 m. This occurs every few sec

Dethcube.name: Dethcube
Dethcube.notes: Vaporize will blast a target within 4 m for minor damage, stunning them for a short duration, This effect has a 30 sec cooldown

Diriga.abilities: Single Stunlock or AOE Damage Pulse
Diriga.name: Diriga
Diriga.notes: Electro Pulse stuns a target within 10 m until they are 15 m away or die. Has a 5 sec cooldown. Arc Coil will zap to 7 enemies in range every sec, dealing minor damage with a 10% chance to stun. Equiping both will negate Electro Pulse.

Djinn.name: Djinn
Djinn.notes: Fatal Attraction causes all enemies within 24 m to walk harmlessly towards the Djinn over 5 sec. If there are 2 or more enemies within 6 m at the end, it will deal an explosion of Corrosive damage with a 100% proc chance to everything within the 6m. This ability has a 30 sec cooldown

Helios Prime.name: Helios Prime
Helios Prime.notes: Investigator will perform codex scans 50 m (needs scanner charges equipped). Detect Vulnerability reveals weakspots for 10 sec on enemies in the codex, increasing damage taken by that enemy by 275%. Both abilities take 2 sec to activate. If not using Deconstructor Prime, goes to Viable tier

Helminth Charger.name: Helminth Charger
Helminth Charger.notes: Proboscis will pull a single target within 30 m to the Helminth, dealing minor damage. Trample causes the Helminth to ram towards an enemy, dealing heavy damage to everything in the way. Trample has an 8 sec cooldown

Huras Kubrow.name: Huras Kubrow
Huras Kubrow.notes: Stalk will cloak Huras and its Tenno for as long as an enemy is in line of sight. Cloak breaks on attack. After being broken the ability has an 8 sec cooldown. Hunt causes the Huras to ram towards an enemy, dealing heavy damage to everything in the way. Hunt has an 8 sec cooldown.

Prisma Shade.name: Prisma Shade
Prisma Shade.notes: Ghost will cloak the Shade and its Tenno for as long as an enemy is in line of sight. Cloak breaks on attack. After leaving cloak, this ability has a 10 sec cooldown.

Raksa Kubrow.name: Raksa Kubrow
Raksa Kubrow.notes: Howl fears up to 15 enemies within 24 m for 16 sec. This ability has a 40 sec cooldown. Protect restores up to 300 shields to the Raksa and its Tenno. This ability has a 7 sec cooldown

Sahasa Kubrow.name: Sahasa Kubrow
Sahasa Kubrow.notes: Dig causes the Sahasa to dig for 5 sec and create a pile of items. This ability has a 15 sec cooldown (longer if near a previous dig site). Ferocity allows the Sahasa to deal bonus damage to downed enemies, if non-fatal the kubrow is stunned for a few sec. Less loot frames equates to higher tier.

Smeeta Kavat.name: Smeeta Kavat
Smeeta Kavat.notes: Mischief creates a clone of Smeeta and cloaks the kavat. Clone lives for 9 sec with a 7 sec cooldown. Charm has a 28% chance to grant a random buff, every 27 sec. Possible buffs: 200% Flat Critical chance for 30 seconds, 100% Energy Costs Refunded for 10 seconds, Double Affinity and Resource pickups for 120 seconds, Reload Instantly, Ignore the damage of next recieved hit and gives 150 shields, or 1 rare resource from the planet you are on

Sunika Kubrow.name: Sunika Kubrow
Sunika Kubrow.notes: Unleashed causes the Sunika to charge 60 m and pin down any VIP (includes Capture Targets, Synthisis Targets, and some Bosses). Savagery allows the Sahasa to deal bonus damage to downed enemies; If non-fatal the kubrow will be stunned for a few seconds

Taxon.name: Taxon
Taxon.notes: Molecular Conversion will blast an enemy within 10 m for 200 radiation damage, generating shields equal to damage dealt. This ability has a 12 sec cooldown

Wyrm Prime.name: Wyrm Prime
Wyrm Prime.notes: Crowd Dispersion deals 10 magnetic damage and ragdolls everything within 10 m. This ability has a 15 sec cooldown; Only triggers if there's more than one enemy within range

Banshee Prime.name: Banshee Prime
Banshee Prime.notes: Sound Quake deals constant area damage in a huge radius, Staggering everything hit. Augmenting pushes it even farther, Dealing far more in an even larger the area, at the tradeoff of more energy spent. Fares very badly without a team covering her. Defense mods are fairly pointless. Augment is nearly always worth it. Makes a poor DPS for survival, due to slowing down enemy spawns indirectly, and generally killing things too far away

Atterax.name: Atterax
Atterax.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. As of 23.9.1 there's a bug with the stance. Unequip the stance or slide from quick melee (with guns equipped).

Dual Keres.name: Dual Keres
Dual Keres.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, very high attack speed. Good balance of speed and crit. ✪

Dual Ichor.name: Dual Ichor
Dual Ichor.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed. Ties with Nami Skyla Prime. ✪

Nami Skyla Prime.name: Nami Skyla Prime
Nami Skyla Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, very high attack speed. Ties with Dual Ichor. ✪

Twin Krohkur.name: Twin Krohkur
Twin Krohkur.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Lower crit and speed hamper scaling in extreme situations. ✪

Galatine Prime.name: Galatine Prime
Galatine Prime.wepnotes: High damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed.

Tipedo.name: Tipedo
Tipedo.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, very high attack speed. ✪

Tonbo.name: Tonbo
Tonbo.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. ✪

Prisma Dual Cleavers.name: Prisma Dual Cleavers
Prisma Dual Cleavers.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed. Augment adds Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) effects and +100% to base damage.

Dual Zoren.name: Dual Zoren
Dual Zoren.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, very high attack speed. Zorencoptering, anyone? ✪

Mios.name: Mios
Mios.stancenotes: Alt combo= Heart of the Naga; +DPS, -execution, -ragdolls
Mios.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed.

Scoliac.name: Scoliac
Scoliac.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane DPS, high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. As of 23.9.1 there's a bug with the stance. Unequip the stance or slide from quick melee (with guns equipped). ✪

Secura Lecta.name: Secura Lecta
Secura Lecta.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane DPS, high attack speed. Killing an enemy with this weapon equipped gives bonus credits. As of 23.9.1 there's a bug with the stance. Unequip the stance or slide from quick melee (with guns equipped).

Dual Kamas Prime.name: Dual Kamas Prime
Dual Kamas Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, very high attack speed.

Nami Solo.name: Nami Solo
Nami Solo.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed. ✪

Gazal Machete.name: Gazal Machete
Gazal Machete.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed. Can be paired with Djinn's Fatal Attraction for approximately 16.6% uptime. ✪

Destreza Prime.name: Destreza Prime
Destreza Prime.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. ✪

Dark Split-sword.name: Dark Split-sword
Dark Split-sword.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, insane dps, very high attack speed. Heavy blade mode is severely underpowered. ✪

Lacera.name: Lacera
Lacera.stancenotes: Alt combo= Heart of the Naga; +DPS, -execution, -ragdolls
Lacera.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very low attack speed. ✪

Gram Prime.name: Gram Prime
Gram Prime.wepnotes: Very high damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency. Combo multiplier is limited at integers at 30x the normal requirements, making it difficult to ramp up quickly. ✪

Gunsen.name: Gunsen
Gunsen.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very high attack speed.

Endura.name: Endura
Endura.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.

Silva & Aegis Prime.name: Silva & Aegis Prime
Silva & Aegis Prime.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very low attack speed. Blocking adds up to 4 charges that increases critical and status chance by 15% additively. Avenging Truth absorbs 50% of incoming damage and releases it on the next charge attack and Truth (Gas, health, parkour) effects.

Jat Kusar.name: Jat Kusar
Jat Kusar.stancenotes: Alt combo= Heart of the Naga; +DPS, -execution, -ragdolls
Jat Kusar.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.

Dual Raza.name: Dual Raza
Dual Raza.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed. ✪

Scindo Prime.name: Scindo Prime
Scindo Prime.wepnotes: High damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed.

Twin Basolk.name: Twin Basolk
Twin Basolk.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency. Rift Strike teleports user to a target within 25m on charge attack.

Venka Prime.name: Venka Prime
Venka Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed. Has 50% more melee combo multiplier.

Nikana Prime.name: Nikana Prime
Nikana Prime.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed.

Dex Dakra.name: Dex Dakra
Dex Dakra.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.

Ohma.name: Ohma
Ohma.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed. Slams have guaranteed Electricity proc in 8.5m radius.

Glaive Prime.name: Glaive Prime
Glaive Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very high attack speed.

Sarpa.name: Sarpa
Sarpa.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.

Kronen Prime.name: Kronen Prime
Kronen Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very high attack speed. ✪

Skiajati.name: Skiajati
Skiajati.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very high attack speed. Grants invisibility upon finisher, which will expire when attacking, using an ability, or after 5s.

Okina.name: Okina
Okina.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed.

Machete Wraith.name: Machete Wraith
Machete Wraith.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed. ✪

Ether Daggers.name: Ether Daggers
Ether Daggers.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very low attack speed. ✪

Kesheg.name: Kesheg
Kesheg.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.

Orthos Prime.name: Orthos Prime
Orthos Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency.

Bo Prime.name: Bo Prime
Bo Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed.

Ceramic Dagger.name: Ceramic Dagger
Ceramic Dagger.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed. ✪

Broken Scepter.name: Broken Scepter
Broken Scepter.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very high attack speed. Can Drain enemies to spawn health/energy orb.

Krohkur.name: Krohkur
Krohkur.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.

Broken War.name: Broken War
Broken War.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed.

Ninkondi.name: Ninkondi
Ninkondi.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed.

Ack & Brunt.name: Ack & Brunt
Ack & Brunt.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.

Lesion.name: Lesion
Lesion.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency. Causing status proc buffs the weapon to give it 15% more innate attack speed and toxin damage.

Vaykor Sydon.name: Vaykor Sydon
Vaykor Sydon.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency. Blocking adds up to 15 stacks, which will emit Radial Blind in a 15m radius for 5s upon reaching the 15th stack. Also adds 50% resistance to knockdown/knockback.

Karyst.name: Karyst
Karyst.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very low attack speed.

Volnus.name: Volnus
Volnus.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Volnus.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very high attack speed.

War.name: War
War.wepnotes: High damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. What is it good for?

Ether Reaper.name: Ether Reaper
Ether Reaper.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed.

Hate.name: Hate
Hate.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.

Rakta Dark Dagger.name: Rakta Dark Dagger
Rakta Dark Dagger.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. Can use the Gleaming Blight augment. Blight (Viral, energy, movement speed) effects. While wielded, enemies have reduced detection radius. Radiation procs restore shields and may grant overshields.

Heat Dagger.name: Heat Dagger
Heat Dagger.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very low attack speed. Slam attacks deal Heat damage and have high chance of proccing Heat.

Telos Boltace.name: Telos Boltace
Telos Boltace.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency. Slide attack triggers Stormpath, which vacuums enemies in a 14m radius. Retriggering Stormpath within 8s puts it into a 6s cooldown and ragdoll enemies. Also gives 20% boost to parkour.

Cassowar.name: Cassowar
Cassowar.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed.

Zenistar.name: Zenistar
Zenistar.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very low attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency. Charge attack deploys flying disc that deals AOE damage and allow the rest of the weapon to deal physical damage.

Halikar.name: Halikar
Halikar.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed. Thrown attacks can disarm opponents.

Prova Vandal.name: Prova Vandal
Prova Vandal.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency. Slam attacks always proc Electricity. Static Discharge deals 80% of weapon damage as Electricity damage to nearby enemies.

Dual Heat Swords.name: Dual Heat Swords
Dual Heat Swords.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. Slam attacks procs Heat in an AOE.

Sheev.name: Sheev
Sheev.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very low attack speed. Slam attacks guarantees heat proc.

Hirudo.name: Hirudo
Hirudo.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Upon crit, heal you for 5% of damage dealt, and gives up to 5 stacks of Invigorate (+5% max health, 15s).

Caustacyst.combo: Charge Attack (finisher proc) or Dying Light
Caustacyst.name: Caustacyst
Caustacyst.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency. Charge attack throws wave of Corrosive damage, staggers enemies and causes guaranteed slash proc on direct contact.

Amphis.name: Amphis
Amphis.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very high attack speed.

Dual Ether.name: Dual Ether
Dual Ether.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.

Kogake Prime.name: Kogake Prime
Kogake Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Increases movement speed by 5% when equipped.

Arca Titron.name: Arca Titron
Arca Titron.wepnotes: Very high damage per hit, moderate DPS, very low attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency. Kills grant up to 10 Capacitor (+100% electricity damage) charges that is used on next slam attack. Slams also proc electricity and overrides hammer ragdoll.

Guandao.name: Guandao
Guandao.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.

Ripkas.name: Ripkas
Ripkas.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Hunter's Bonesaw increases damage by 90% and status chance by 60% on grounded enemies.

Dakra Prime.name: Dakra Prime
Dakra Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.

Fang Prime.name: Fang Prime
Fang Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Reaper Prime.name: Reaper Prime
Reaper Prime.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency.

Tekko.name: Tekko
Tekko.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Cerata.name: Cerata
Cerata.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.

Ankyros Prime.name: Ankyros Prime
Ankyros Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very high attack speed.

Prisma Skana.name: Prisma Skana
Prisma Skana.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Bright Purity adds 100% melee damage and Purity (Corrosive, health) effects.

Serro.name: Serro
Serro.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Mire.name: Mire
Mire.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Innate +10% toxin damage boost. Toxic Blight increases toxin damage by 100% and causes Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) effects.

Dual Skana.name: Dual Skana
Dual Skana.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very low attack speed.

Pangolin Sword.name: Pangolin Sword
Pangolin Sword.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Jump attacks always proc Electricity.

Shaku.name: Shaku
Shaku.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency.

Prisma Obex.name: Prisma Obex
Prisma Obex.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very high attack speed.  Suffers from poor consistency. Entropy Detonation cause ground finisher kills to explode for 1,000 (+20% enemy max health) Blast damage and Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) effects.

Kama.name: Kama
Kama.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.

Orvius.name: Orvius
Orvius.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very low attack speed. Channeled throw suspends enemies in midair.

Ether Sword.name: Ether Sword
Ether Sword.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Slam attacks procs Radiation in an AOE.

Furax Wraith.name: Furax Wraith
Furax Wraith.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.

Synoid Heliocor.name: Synoid Heliocor
Synoid Heliocor.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Synoid Heliocor.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Scans kills into codex, and if the target's Codex entry is complete it will create a friendly Spectre of said target. Spectre lasts 30s.

Jat Kittag.name: Jat Kittag
Jat Kittag.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Jat Kittag.wepnotes: High damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Vulcan Blitz cause kills to explode dealing 300 (+60% of enemy health) Blast damage in 6m radius. Part of the Tenno Space Program.

Cronus.name: Cronus
Cronus.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Jaw Sword.name: Jaw Sword
Jaw Sword.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Blade of Truth increases damage by 100% and gives Truth (Gas, health, parkour) effects.

Plasma Sword.name: Plasma Sword
Plasma Sword.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very low attack speed.

Dark Sword.name: Dark Sword
Dark Sword.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency.

Anku.name: Anku
Anku.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.

Kestrel.name: Kestrel
Kestrel.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Entropy Flight grants +140% flight speed and Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) effects.

Sibear.name: Sibear
Sibear.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Sibear.wepnotes: High damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Charge attacks gives +50% status chance for 4s.

Sancti Magistar.name: Sancti Magistar
Sancti Magistar.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Sancti Magistar.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Innate 10% Blast effect proc. Reduces damage from status effects by 75%. Charge attacks heals nearby allies based on damage dealt.

Fragor Prime.name: Fragor Prime
Fragor Prime.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Fragor Prime.wepnotes: High damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Redeemer.name: Redeemer
Redeemer.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Bullet fire is only blast damage.

Heliocor.name: Heliocor
Heliocor.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Heliocor.wepnotes: High damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Gives one codex scan upon kill.

Amprex.name: Amprex
Amprex.notes: Low damage per beam, insane DPS, beam munition, acceptable ammo econ. Beam chains to nearby enemies giving it decent AOE. † * $ ✪

Arca Plasmor.name: Arca Plasmor
Arca Plasmor.notes: High damage per slug, monstrous DPS, projectile munition, acceptable ammo econ. Single pellet is wide with punchthrough and therefore can act as "AOE" and reliably proc status effects. Does not have a headshot multiplier. †

Argonak (Primary Fire).name: Argonak
Argonak (Primary Fire).notes: Average damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Scoping highlights enemies for easier targetting. Alternate between semi-auto (higher DPS) and full-auto (higher fire rate) to deal with different enemies. †

Astilla.name: Astilla
Astilla.notes: Moderate damage per slug, monstrous DPS, projectile munition, worrying ammo econ. Deals 30% of damage upon impact and 70% on explosion. ✪

Attica.name: Attica
Attica.notes: Average damage per arrow, very high DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. † ✪

Baza.name: Baza
Baza.notes: Low damage per bullet, insane DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Completely silent but has damage falloff similar to shotguns. † * ✪

Boar Prime.name: Boar Prime
Boar Prime.notes: Average damage per shell, monstrous DPS, hitscan munitions, bad ammo econ. Required to mod for 100% status chance. ✪

Boltor Prime.name: Boltor Prime
Boltor Prime.notes: Low damage per bolt, very hgh DPS, projetile munition, worrying ammo econ.

Braton Prime.name: Braton Prime
Braton Prime.notes: Low damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ.

Burston Prime.name: Burston Prime
Burston Prime.notes: Low damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Gilded Truth (Arbiters of Hexis) increases fire rate and provide Truth effect (Gas, health, parkour).

Buzlok.name: Buzlok
Buzlok.notes: Mediocre damage per projectile, monstrous DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. Alt fire launches tracer beacon which gives additive 50% Crit Chance (20 seconds) that remain active even the target is dead. Has insane DPS potential but difficult to attain and is unreliable. † * $ ✪

Cernos Prime.name: Cernos Prime
Cernos Prime.notes: Very high damage per arrow, very high DPS, projectile munition, good ammo econ. Alt fire toggles firing pattern between horizontal and vertical (+50% headshot damage). †

Convectrix.name: Convectrix
Convectrix.notes: Very low damage per beam, very high DPS, beam munition, manageable ammo econ. Primary fire brings the beam from wide to narrow while alt fire sweeps the beam. Alt fire sweeps the beam from narrow to wide instead and is useful for applying status effects to large crowds. $

Daikyu.name: Daikyu
Daikyu.notes: Very high damage per arrow, acceptable DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ.

Dera Vandal.name: Dera Vandal
Dera Vandal.notes: Very low damage per projectile, acceptable DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ.

Drakgoon.name: Drakgoon
Drakgoon.notes: High damage per shell, poor DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ.

Dread.name: Dread
Dread.notes: Very high damage per stalker, edgelord DPS, arrow munition, good ammo econ. †

Ferrox.name: Ferrox
Ferrox.notes: Insane damage per projectile, monstrous DPS, secretly hitscan munition, good ammo econ. Munition shot the moment it is fully charged. Alt fire should be used to reduce reliance on primary weapons. †

Flux Rifle.name: Flux Rifle
Flux Rifle.notes: Very low damage per beam, high DPS, beam munition, charged ammo. ✪

Glaxion.name: Glaxion
Glaxion.notes: Very cold damage per beam, icebreaking DPS, cool munition, chilling ammo econ. * $

Gorgon Wraith.name: Gorgon Wraith
Gorgon Wraith.notes: Very low damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ.

Grinlok.name: Grinlok
Grinlok.notes: Acceptable damage per bullet, acceptable DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ.

Harpak.name: Harpak
Harpak.notes: Mediocre damage per projectile, high DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. Three-round burst is wasteful at times. Alt fire launches a harpoon can be used to drag enemies closer. ✪

Hema.name: Hema
Hema.notes: Low damage per mutagen sample, high DPS, projectile munition, draws ammo from warframe health. Heals warframe on headshots. Three-round burst is wasteful at times.

Hind.name: Hind
Hind.notes: Very low damage per bullet, poor DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Alt fire has better DPS on paper but due to low fire rate it still doesn't do enough.

Ignis Wraith.name: Ignis Wraith
Ignis Wraith.notes: Low damage per flame, insane DPS, beam munition, acceptable ammo econ. AOE works like how you'd imagine an actual flamethrower would. † *

Javlok.name: Javlok
Javlok.notes: High damage per projectile, acceptable DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. Alt fire creats a localized explosion.

Karak Wraith.name: Karak Wraith
Karak Wraith.notes: Very low damage per bullet, high DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ.

Kohm.name: Kohm
Kohm.notes: Decent damage per shell, insane DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ (if using Vigilante Armaments instead of fire rate mod). Spool up increases bullets shot and fire rate to the point where status effects are still reliably proc'd despite using shotgun calcs as well as having insane innate punchthrough. Riven disposition is relatively high for DPS potential and can help reach 100% status chance. ✪

Lanka.name: Lanka
Lanka.notes: Very high damage per projectile, insane DPS, projectile munition, good ammo econ. Sniper combo counter rampup is very good (min. 2), zooming in gives additive bonus to Crit Chance (20%/30%/50%). † * ✪

Latron Prime.base: Vanilla is low Need buffs while Wraith is low Viable
Latron Prime.name: Latron Prime
Latron Prime.notes: Average damage per bullet, very high DPS, hitscan munition, good ammo econ. †

Lenz.name: Lenz
Lenz.notes: Average damage per on direct hit but subsequent explosion is massive damage per arrow, insane DPS, arrow munition, ammo capacity is very low but has small innate ammo mutation. Each arrow procs procs Impact on direct hit, Cold AOE immediately afterwards, and finally Blast AOE explosion. † * ✪

Miter.name: Miter
Miter.notes: Acceptable damage per laser disc, acceptable DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. Neutralizing Justice can instantly destroy nullifier bubbles and has Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) effects.

Mutalist Cernos.name: Mutalist Cernos
Mutalist Cernos.notes: Acceptable damage per fart arrow, acceptable DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. Fully charged arrows leave a gas trail that continues to proc status effects.

Mutalist Quanta.name: Mutalist Quanta
Mutalist Quanta.notes: Very low damage per projectile, poor DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. Alt fire creats a bubble that can be combined up to three times. Firing through the bubble increase damage and critical chance.

Ogris.name: Ogris
Ogris.notes: Low damage per rocket, poor DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. Nightwatch Napalm turns the Ogris into an area denial weapon.

Opticor.name: Opticor
Opticor.notes: Caution, may contain Spartan Laser. Do not stare directly into beam.

Panthera.name: Panthera
Panthera.notes: Low damage per rotary cutter, poor DPS, projectile munition, decent ammo econ. Alt-fire puts a spinning blade a few meters in from of the weapon that constantly spin and deal damage.

Paracyst.name: Paracyst
Paracyst.notes: Very low damage per projectile, acceptable DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. Three-round burst is wasteful at times.

Paris Prime.name: Paris Prime
Paris Prime.notes: Very high damage per arrow, high DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ.

Phage.name: Phage
Phage.notes: Very low damage per touch, insane DPS, tentacle munition, tickling ammo econ. Scoping narrows down the beam to a single point. † $ ✪

Prisma Gorgon.name: Prisma Gorgon
Prisma Gorgon.notes: Low damage per bullet, insane DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Roll for recoil reduction in riven. † ✪

Prisma Grakata.name: Prisma Grakata
Prisma Grakata.notes: Clem damage per grakata, get clem DPS, dakka munition, clem ammo econ.

Prisma Tetra.name: Prisma Tetra
Prisma Tetra.notes: Very low damage per pew pew, poor DPS, projectile munition, poor ammo econ.

Quanta Vandal.name: Quanta Vandal
Quanta Vandal.notes: Low damage per beam, insane DPS, beam munition, acceptable ammo econ. Could do with punchthrough but build is tight as it is. Alt fire useful to learn Euclidean geometry. † * $

Rakta Cernos.name: Rakta Cernos
Rakta Cernos.notes: High damage per arrow, very high DPS, projectile munition, good ammo econ. Good syndicate proc (Viral + energy restore) but doesn't do much for DPS since effective fire-rate for bows are low. †

Rubico Prime.name: Rubico Prime
Rubico Prime.notes: Very high damage per bullet, insane DPS, hitscan munition, good ammo econ. Sniper combo counter rampup is amazing (min. 1), zooming in gives additive bonus to Crit Multiplier (35%/50%). † ✪

Sancti Tigris.name: Sancti Tigris
Sancti Tigris.notes: Very high damage per shell, acceptable DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Duplex trigger might take a while to get used to. Purity (Corrosive, health) effect can be useful.

Scourge.name: Scourge
Scourge.notes: Low damage per projectile, acceptable DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Alt fire creates a localized bullet attractor field on nearby enemies' head.

Secura Penta.name: Secura Penta
Secura Penta.notes: High damage per grenade, poor DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ.

Snipetron Vandal.name: Snipetron Vandal
Snipetron Vandal.notes: Decent damage per bullet, insane DPS, hitscan munition, good ammo econ. Sniper combo counter rampup is average (min. 3), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (30%/50%). † ✪

Sobek.name: Sobek
Sobek.notes: Acceptable damage per shell, high DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Shattering Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) can make it reach 100% status chance while Acid Shells can be used to provide some AOE damage.

Soma Prime.name: Soma Prime
Soma Prime.notes: Very low damage per bullet, monstrous DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Best paired with Frost Prime and Scindo Prime. †

Stradavar (Primary Fire).name: Stradavar
Stradavar (Primary Fire).notes: Low damage per bullet, very high DPS, hitscan munition, acceptable ammo econ. Can alternate between semi-auto (better DPS) and full-auto (useful for breaking nullifier bubbles).

Strun Wraith.name: Strun Wraith
Strun Wraith.notes: High damage per shell, acceptable DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Required to mod for 100% status chance. ✪

Supra Vandal.name: Supra Vandal
Supra Vandal.notes: Low damage per bullet, monstrous DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. Entropy Burst (Magnetic, Energy) can greatly increase status chance. $

Sybaris Prime.base: Vanilla is Need buffs; Dex is high Viable
Sybaris Prime.name: Sybaris Prime
Sybaris Prime.notes: Average damage per bullet, monstrous DPS, hitscan munition, great ammo econ. Two-round burst is wasteful at times and the magazine is relatively small for how fast it fires. †

Synapse.name: Synapse
Synapse.notes: Low damage per beam, insane DPS, beam munition, acceptable ammo econ. † * $ ✪

Synoid Simulor.name: Synoid Simulor
Synoid Simulor.notes: Very low damage per quantum gravitation field, poor DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ.

Telos Boltor.name: Telos Boltor
Telos Boltor.notes: Mediocre damage per bolt, insane DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. Truth (Gas, health, parkour) syndicate proc is helpful at times. †

Tenora.name: Tenora
Tenora.notes: Low damage per bullet, insane DPS, hitscan munition, dainty ammo econ. Has a decent alt-fire that can be used to take down medium units quickly. Light units and heavy units should still be dealth with using primary fire. † *

Tiberon Prime.name: Tiberon Prime
Tiberon Prime.notes: Average damage per bullet, insane DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Alt-fire toggles between 3-round burst, semi-auto, and auto. Testing so far shows that burst fire has 5% edge on DPS compared to semi-auto at the expense of ammo economy. † ✪

Tigris Prime.name: Tigris Prime
Tigris Prime.notes: Insane damage per shell, insane DPS, hitscan munition, great ammo econ. Duplex trigger might take a while to get used to. Required to mod for 100% status chance.

Tonkor.name: Tonkor
Tonkor.notes: Average damage per grenade, poor DPS, projectile munition, great ammo econ. Grenades can cause self damage.

Torid.name: Torid
Torid.notes: Average damage per thing, acceptable DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. Thing fired stick on surfaces/targets and continue to emit gas that deals damage and causes status effects.

Vaykor Hek.base: Base version is only slightly worse.
Vaykor Hek.name: Vaykor Hek
Vaykor Hek.notes: High damage per shell, insane DPS, hitscan munition, acceptable ammo econ. Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) effects can be useful. †

Vectis Prime.name: Vectis Prime
Vectis Prime.notes: High damage per bullet, insane DPS, hitscan munition, good ammo econ. Sniper combo counter rampup is slow (min. 5), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (35%/55%). † ✪

Vulkar Wraith.name: Vulkar Wraith
Vulkar Wraith.notes: High damage per bullet, very high DPS, hitscan munition, good ammo econ. Sniper combo counter rampup is very good (min. 2), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (35%/55%/70%). ✪

Zarr.name: Zarr
Zarr.notes: Low damage per eyepatch, high DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. First explosion from primary fire can damage self but subsequent cluster bomblets won't. Each bomblet can cause status effect on it's own. Alt fire switches to shotgun mode.

Zenith.name: Zenith
Zenith.notes: The curator would like to apologize for not owning a time machine.

Zhuge.name: Zhuge
Zhuge.notes: Average damage per arrow, very high DPS, projectile munition, manageable ammo econ. †

Quartakk.name: Quartakk
Quartakk.notes: Very low damage per bullet, monstrous DPS, hitscan munition, manageable ammo econ. Four-shot burst is wasteful at times. † ✪

Corinth.name: Corinth
Corinth.notes: Very high damage per shell, insane DPS, hitscan munition, good ammo econ. Alt fire is useful when the reload button is harder to reach than the secondary fire button. Reload should be done when clip is empty as there is a delay between reloading and firing, but the gains should be minimal. †

Veldt.name: Veldt
Veldt.notes: Decent damage per bullet, very high DPS, hitscan munition, great ammo econ. Alt-fire toggles higher magnification on zoom. †

Phantasma.name: Phantasma
Phantasma.notes: Decent damage per bullet, insane DPS, beam munition, manageable ammo econ. Primary fire has usable AOE. Alt fire charges the weapon to fire an exploding glob that also releases seeking projectiles. More charge; more damage and projectiles. ✪

Madurai.frame: Increased Physical Damage, Increased Elemental Damage
Madurai.name: Madurai
Madurai.notes: Both Dash nodes suck. Both of the Blast nodes are great and get better with amps. Void Radiance is decent. Void Strike is pathetic for its cost.
Madurai.op: Increased Operator Energy Pool and Regeneration for Amps

Naramon.frame: Increased Affinity gain from Melee, Preserves Melee Combo for longer
Naramon.name: Naramon
Naramon.notes: You will never find a time or place to use Void Stalker. Executing Dash is useful with the operator changes. Surging Dash is bad. Blast nodes are good, since they're spammable.
Naramon.op: Increased Operator MoveSpeed and Void Dash Speed

Unairu.frame: Returns part of Damage Taken, Increased Warframe Armor
Unairu.name: Unairu
Unairu.notes: Void Shadow is nice at the right time, the other Void node is laughable. Magnetic Blast has a short duration, but is decent. Good with shotguns. Wisps suck. Dash Nodes suck.
Unairu.op: Increased Operator Armor, Increased Operator Armor (a second time)

Vazarin.frame: Increased Affinity Radius, Limited Instant Revives
Vazarin.name: Vazarin
Vazarin.notes: The Dash nodes are great, provided you are in hard content. Blast nodes suck. Horribly.
Vazarin.op: Increased Operator Health and Health Regeneration

Zenurik.frame: Increased Energy Orb pickups, Area Energy Restore over time, Increased Melee Channeling Efficiency
Zenurik.name: Zenurik
Zenurik.notes: Every single thing that has a flat number value is garbage. Temporal Blast is acceptable.
Zenurik.op: Increased Operator Energy Pool and Regeneration

Acrid.name: Acrid
Acrid.notes: Very low damage per flechettes,average dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy. Each flechette delivers toxin DoT (scales with modified base damage and toxin damage) regardless of elemental modding.

Akbronco Prime.name: Akbronco Prime
Akbronco Prime.notes: High damage per shell, monstrous dps, hitscan munitions, good ammo economy. Modding for 100% status required.✪

Akjagara.name: Akjagara
Akjagara.notes: Low damage per bullet, average dps, hitscan munitions, poor ammo economy.

Aklato.name: Aklato
Aklato.notes: Very low damage per bullet, very low dps, hitscan munitions, poor ammo economy.

Aklex Prime.name: Aklex Prime
Aklex Prime.notes: High damage per bullet, high dps, hitscan munitions, good ammo economy. Massive recoil hurts overall DPS.

Akmagnus.name: Akmagnus
Akmagnus.notes: Average damage per bullet, high dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy.

Aksomati.name: Aksomati
Aksomati.notes: Very low damage per bullet, insane dps, hitscan munitions, worrisome ammo economy. ✪

Akstiletto Prime.name: Akstiletto Prime
Akstiletto Prime.notes: Very low damage per bullet, insane dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy. Very good all-rounder secondary.

Akvasto.name: Akvasto
Akvasto.notes: Low damage per bullet, very low dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy.

Akzani.name: Akzani
Akzani.notes: Very low damage per bullet, high dps, hitscan munitions, poor ammo economy. ✪

Prisma Angstrum.name: Prisma Angstrum
Prisma Angstrum.notes: Insane damage per rocket,mediocre dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy. Multishot causes the rocket to spread out further. Can be charged to launch more rockets at once.

Arca Scisco.name: Arca Scisco
Arca Scisco.notes: Low damage per laser, insane dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy. Each shot landed grants Target Analysis buff. Target Analysis stacks up to 5 times, lasting 2 seconds each. Critical Chance and Status Chance increases by 4% per stack.

Atomos.name: Atomos
Atomos.notes: Very low damage per flame, insane dps, beam munitions, manageable ammo economy. Chains 7m away, even when shooting at dead bodies.$ ✪

Azima.name: Azima
Azima.notes: Very low damage per bullet, insane dps, hitscan munitions, worrisome ammo economy. Alt fire launches the remaining clip that will act as a 4-point dumb turret.✪

Ballistica Prime.name: Ballistica Prime
Ballistica Prime.notes: Very high damage per arrow, mediocre dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy. Charged shot kills turns the target into a ghostly specter for 7 seconds.

Brakk.name: Brakk
Brakk.notes: High damage per bullet, high dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy. RIP Raids.

Bronco Prime.name: Bronco Prime
Bronco Prime.notes: High damage per shell, average dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy. Modding for 100% status required.

Cycron.name: Cycron
Cycron.notes: Very low damage per beam, mediocre dps, beam munitions, good ammo economy. Does not have an ammo reserve. Ammo in clip regenerates over time when not firing.$

Despair.name: Despair
Despair.notes: Low damage per projectile, low dps, projectile munitions, poor ammo economy.

Dex Furis.name: Dex Furis
Dex Furis.notes: Very low damage per bullet, monstrous dps, hitscan munitions, worrisome ammo economy. Despite being called the Furis, it uses the Afuris riven.✪

Dual Toxocyst.name: Dual Toxocyst
Dual Toxocyst.notes: Low damage per bullet, very high dps, hitscan munitions, great ammo economy. Headshot grants Frenzy buff. Frenzy lasts 3 seconds and can be refreshed. Frenzy grants 100% increase in Toxin damage (on base damage), 150% increase in fire rate, recoil reduction, and doesn't consume ammo while firing.

Embolist.name: Embolist
Embolist.notes: Very low damage per fart, very high dps, beam munitions, good ammo economy. $ ✪

Euphona Prime.name: Euphona Prime
Euphona Prime.notes: Insane damage per slug, insane dps, projectile munitions, good ammo economy. Alt-fire switches to multi-pellet mode that can achieve 100% status chance when modded properly. However, slug mode firing has superior DPS and hybrid modding will gimp both builds.

Furis.name: Furis
Furis.notes: Very low damage per bullet, low dps, hitscan munitions, poor ammo economy. Winds of Purity grants Purity (Corrosive, health) and lifesteal.

Fusilai.name: Fusilai
Fusilai.notes: Low damage per throwing knife, very high dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy. Alt-fire launches three throwing knives horizontally instead.

Hikou Prime.name: Hikou Prime
Hikou Prime.notes: Very low damage per shuriken, high dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy.

Knell.name: Knell
Knell.notes: Average damage per headshot, insane dps, hitscan munitions, great ammo economy. Headshot grants Death Knell buff. Death Knell can stack up to 3 times, lasting 3 seconds per stack. Stack-count regardless, 20% status chance and infinite ammo is granted. Critical Multiplier increases (x1.5, x2.0, x2.5) per stack.✪

Kraken.name: Kraken
Kraken.notes: Very low damage per bullet, very low dps, hitscan munitions, poor ammo economy.

Kulstar.name: Kulstar
Kulstar.notes: High damage per rocket, average dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy. Rocket impact will release 3 additional bomblets.

Kunai.name: Kunai
Kunai.notes: Very low damage per kunai, very low dps, projectile munitions, poor ammo economy. Good luck landing a precise shot.

Lato.name: Lato
Lato.notes: Very low damage per bullet, very low dps, hitscan munitions, poor ammo economy because you need to spend a lot of ammo trying to kill something in the first place.

Lex Prime.name: Lex Prime
Lex Prime.notes: High damage per bullet, average dps, hitscan munitions, good ammo economy. Massive recoil hurts overall DPS.

Mara Detron.name: Mara Detron
Mara Detron.notes: High damage per shell, insane dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy. Modding for 100% status required.✪

Nukor.name: Nukor
Nukor.notes: Very low damage per microwave, high dps, beam munitions, manageable ammo economy. Hitting a specific part multiple times increases damage dealt to that part by 50%. Unusually, Nukor has very high Critical Multiplier but poor Critical Chance, hence it's DPS increase from flat Crit Chance modifiers is relatively higher than other weapons.$ ✪

Pandero.name: Pandero
Pandero.notes: Average damage per bullet, monstrous dps, hitscan munitions, good ammo economy. Alt-fire empties clip onto enemy with some worrying recoil.

Pox.name: Pox
Pox.notes: Very low damage per pox, insane dps, projectile munitions, worrisome ammo economy. Firing launches gas darts that will fill a moderate AOE with gas. Modding 100% status is highly recommended.

Pyrana Prime.name: Pyrana Prime
Pyrana Prime.notes: Insane damage per shell, insane dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy. ✪

Rakta Ballistica.name: Rakta Ballistica
Rakta Ballistica.notes: Very high damage per arrow, low dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy. Blight (Viral, energy, movement speed) is useful at times.

Sancti Castanas.name: Sancti Castanas
Sancti Castanas.notes: Very high damage per remote grenade, mediocre dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy. Purity (Corrosive, health) can be useful at times.

Secura Dual Cestra.name: Secura Dual Cestra
Secura Dual Cestra.notes: Very low damage per projectile, insane dps, projectile munitions, poor ammo economy. Sequence (Radiation, shields) can be useful at times. ✪

Seer.name: Seer
Seer.notes: Low damage per bullet, very low dps, projectile munitions, poor ammo economy.

Sicarus Prime.name: Sicarus Prime
Sicarus Prime.notes: Low damage per bullet, insane dps, hitscan munitions, worrisome ammo economy. Three-round burst is wasteful at times. ✪

Sonicor.name: Sonicor
Sonicor.notes: Average damage per booster, average dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy. The tenno space program has been replaced by the tenno ragdoll simulator.

Spectra.name: Spectra
Spectra.notes: Very low damage per beam, high dps, beam munitions, manageable ammo economy. $ ✪

Spira Prime.name: Spira Prime
Spira Prime.notes: Average damage per cheetos, monstrous dps, projectile munitions, good ammo economy.

Staticor.name: Staticor
Staticor.notes: Average damage per hadouken, insane dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy. Bolt and resulting explosion has independent chance to proc status effects, making it highly capable of stripping armor.

Stug.name: Stug
Stug.notes: Insane damage per blob, very low dps, projectile munitions, poor ammo economy. Each shot launches a blob. Up to six blobs can accumulate at a single site on the target. Alt-fire charges the weapon to launch a single, larger blob.

Synoid Gammacor.name: Synoid Gammacor
Synoid Gammacor.notes: Very low damage per beam, insane dps, beam munitions, worrisome ammo economy. Innate Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) is useful at times. $

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.notes: Average damage per remote grenade, low dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy.

Telos Akbolto.name: Telos Akbolto
Telos Akbolto.notes: Low damage per bolt, low dps, projectile munitions, poor ammo economy. Truth (Gas, health, parkour) is useful at times.

Twin Grakata.name: Twin Grakata
Twin Grakata.notes: Very dakka per dakka, get clem dps, grakata munitions, clem ammo economy.

Prisma Twin Gremlins.name: Prisma Twin Gremlins
Prisma Twin Gremlins.notes: Low damage per bullet, insane dps, projectile munitions, poor ammo economy. ✪

Twin Kohmak.name: Twin Kohmak
Twin Kohmak.notes: Average damage per shell, insane dps, hitscan munitions, poor ammo economy. Spool up increases pellets shot and fire rate to the point where status effects are still reliably proc'd despite using shotgun calcs.✪

Twin Rogga.name: Twin Rogga
Twin Rogga.notes: Insane damage per shell, very high dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy. Modding for 100% status required.

Twin Vipers Wraith.name: Twin Vipers Wraith
Twin Vipers Wraith.notes: Very low damage per bullet, low dps, hitscan munitions, poor ammo economy.

Tysis.name: Tysis
Tysis.notes: Low damage per dart, high dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy. ✪

Vasto Prime.name: Vasto Prime
Vasto Prime.notes: Average damage per bullet, very high dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy. ✪

Vaykor Marelok.name: Vaykor Marelok
Vaykor Marelok.notes: Average damage per bullet, average dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy. Justice (Blast, health, armor) can be helpful at times.

Zakti.name: Zakti
Zakti.notes: Very low damage per pellet, mediocre dps, projectile munitions, manageable ammo economy. Pellets explode after landing, causing Impact status and Gas damage and status.

Akbolto Prime.name: Akbolto Prime
Akbolto Prime.notes: Low damage per bolt, monstrous dps, projectile munitions, worrisome ammo economy. Keep your friends close; keep your enemies closer. Because bolts have travel time.

Hystrix.name: Hystrix
Hystrix.notes: Low damage per bolt, monstrous dps, projectile munitions, annoying ammo economy. Bolts munitions have pros and cons. Clip is small for fire rate and despite quick reload will end up being annoying. Alt-fire changes elemental damage to one of four basic types (Fire, Ice, Poison, Electricity) with guaranteed procs which scales more if corresponding elemental mod is installed.

Stubba.name: Stubba
Stubba.notes: Very low damage per bullet, insane dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy. ✪

Zylok.name: Zylok
Zylok.notes: Low damage per bullet, low dps, hitscan munitions, manageable ammo economy.

artax.name: Artax
artax.notes: Procs Cold on enemies hit by beam. Scales poorly with everything

deconstructor_prime.name: Deconstructor Prime
deconstructor_prime.notes: Very high damage, very high status chance, and deals Impact/Puncture/Slash depending on hit location. Cannot be used with anything other then a Helios or Helios Prime

deth_machine_rifle.name: Deth Machine Rifle
deth_machine_rifle.notes: Low damage per bullet, spool-up time and acceptable DPS. Fires so many bullets it procs status often. Often get "stuck" firing at something it can't hit (breaking line of sight will reset)

prime_laser_rifle.name: Prime Laser Rifle
prime_laser_rifle.notes: Non-Hitscan, pinpoint accurate but has horrible recoil. Deals low damage per bullet that actually hits.

prisma_burst_laser.name: Prisma Burst Laser
prisma_burst_laser.notes: Inaccurate projectile pistol, but has 0 reload time and can reach high firerates with high status chance.

stinger.name: Stinger
stinger.notes: Horrible accuracy, bad damage, bad status chance, bad critical stats, procs Toxin per hit

sweeper_prime.name: Sweeper Prime
sweeper_prime.notes: High base damage, large magazine, low damage fall-off, but low fire rate. High spread. Hitscan.

vulklok.name: Vulklok
vulklok.notes: Low fire rate. Fantastic stats across the board except fire rate. Viable tier with no fire rate mods

frame.text: Frames are currently being redone. Please be patient as that part of the list is worked on!

hosting.note_to_sakai: you take this alert out after about 1 mo. October 26th
hosting.text: Hosting costs will now be covered by Creators' Collective at https://creatorscollective.club.

hm.name: hunmun
hm.text: † indicates a weapon that significantly improves when used with Hunter Munitions.

hc.name: heavycal
hc.text: * indicates a weapon that can utilize Heavy Caliber without significant loss.

pt.name: punchthrough
pt.text: $ indicates a weapon that can utilize punchthrough, but would probably not have the slot for it.

dispo.name: disposition
dispo.text: ✪ indicates a weapon that has an unusually high riven disposition for its rank.

riven.name: rivenDisposition
riven.text: All weapons are tested and therefore ranked without using riven mods.

utubechannel.name: channel
utubechannel.text: All weapon tests will be uploaded (eventually)
